venue.name: Roots and Wings Yoga and Healing ArtsCenter

item.description:
November’s FREE Community Evening of Guided Meditations at Roots and Wings, our gift to you:

Connecting to your Inner Power to Create

Friday evening, October, 18th, 7:15 - 8:45 pm

  • Did you know that you’re creating through your thoughts and words every moment?
  • Being into the Law of Attraction you probably do know this; but are you creating what you want, or what you don’t want?
  • You have the power within you to create whatever you want!

Come join us; and connect to your inner power to create through a series of deep guided meditations and discussions.  In one of the meditations, you'll get to change your inner "story" from inside the vortex of Source and Love.  This is so powerful!

“Overall, it was a wonderful experience! :-) It was great to connect with my inner self through the meditations as well as learn a new technique that allowed myself to be at peace (instead of stuck) with certain "struggles." Thank you! :-) Amy


“It was a very meaningful evening. I found Ann to be extremely effective in creating a wonderful presentation and an atmosphere that allowed me to experience more than I had hoped for. In the world we live today, the peace, relaxation, and happiness that come with her techniques are not to be missed.” Lee

Treat yourself to this wonderful free event for you. Please invite others to sign up and join you. Share this with your friends, family and groups. The class is appropriate for everyone, and all are welcome!

Space is limited, so your RSVP is required.  Please plan on arriving around 7:05 to get settled.  

Also, PLEASE be considerate of your host (me!), and honor your "yes" rsvp by either showing up or letting us know if your plans change by changing your rsvp. Many of you have been wonderful about this, and we very much appreciate your understanding, consideration and support!  Thank you!

Hope you'll join us!
Ann

Class leader: Ann Ide, M.A., www.newpossibilitiescoaching.com, certified master practitioner and trainer in Neuro-linguistic Programming and Hypnotherapy, and certified NLP Life Coach. Ann coaches people to move beyond struggles and mere survival, to new levels of harmony, happiness and success. With her expert questioning, inner exploration processes and personal change interventions, clients become emotionally and spiritually aligned to more easily create the happiness they want.

This public event is co-sponsored by Roots and Wings and New Possibilities Coaching as a community service; and is being shared with you because of it's applicability to successfully utilizing law of attraction principles through greater allowing and connection to your Greater Spirit-Self.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the Wings studio on the first floor

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Connecting to your Inner Power to Create
